title: FoodLog
subtitle: Capture your meals instantly
hintText: Point camera at your food for instant analysis
aiAnalysisDesc: Identifying food items and calculating nutrition...

welcome.title: Welcome to FoodLog
welcome.message: Capture your meals instantly with one tap. Enable camera access to get started.

permissions.title: Camera Permission Required
permissions.message: To log your meals with photos, please allow camera access.

capture.successMessage: Your food has been automatically saved and analyzed.
capture.errorMessage: Failed to capture photo. Please try again.
